text:
IMPORTANT MATERIAL FOUND IN
Management-Labor Consultation Service file
January 21, 1955
May 1, 1954 -
April 29, 1954
March 31, 1954
Letter to Mr. Schooley from Miss Howard
- referring to letter of April 16, 1954 announcing approval
of grant of $7,000 for consulting serviee in union and
labor relations problems for a period of one year
beginning April 1, 1954 (copy attached)
- referring to letter of December 13, 1954 from Dr. Skornia
to Mr. Griffiths listing additional requests (copy
atlached)
- informing that FAE has approved an extension in the term
of the grant to June 30, 1956
Letter to Mr. Young from Dr. Skornia acknowledging receipt
of check number 0776, $7,000;
Letter to Mr. Griffiths from Dr. Skornia requesting grant
of $15,000 (for 3 year period)
$7,000 - 1st yr; 8,000 last two years
